I know, it's a bummer, at least I put my radio right there dead center so  =

people could see it scanning, it's strange how sometimes now when I play 
=
back  the RT scans on utube, I hear a lot more, and didn't respond to them =
at 
the  time, probably because they talked so darn fast, they might think =
i 
iggied them  or something.  I can hear my mother yelling my time in the =
back 
ground too,  she sounded all excited, here is a picture of my mom whe=
n she was 
54 years  old, she looked young for her age, she crossed back in=
 2003 right 
after Mother's  Day.  That was a spooky story to her passing, =
I told Bruce 
about it in a  letter, because said he was going to see if he=
 could contact 
her, but he is  probably way too busy....but, that's ok, I =
know she's fine 
over there, I think  it's just another dimension wrapped a=
round, and through 
this one. sf

 


In a message dated 3/9/2011 10:24:21 =
P.M. Eastern Standard Time,  
urkel23@... writes:

 
 
 

They could ha=
ve had it on AM regular mode, not AM wide. AM wide pulls  in a 
lot of radi=
o, but AM regular mode only pulls in a few. Also, i think i  
heard somebod=
y say they were wrapping it in tin foil to make a faraday  cage.

Not sure =
about that, because you can't see it in the  video.

-Steve

ass treble, and 
it

lear as hers. sf
